revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Santalune Forest |image = [[File:Santalune Forest.png|250px]] |caption = A map of Santalune Forest. |tokens = 400,000 |location = Between Routes 2 and 3. }} '''Santalune Forest''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kalos]]. It initially has 100 tiles arranged in a 10x10 square, including 10 chest tiles, 23 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 5,803,020 HP.
== Tables des rencontres == ===Rencontres sauvages===
